CustomField.formula: if ((Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'China Pod' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'China Brand Pod' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'China Programmatic Pod' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'China Perf-DSO Pod' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'China Perf-RSO Pod' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'China Export Pod'), 'China', /*if ( Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'India Pod' , 'India', */ if ( Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'ISP' , 'ISP', if ( Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'iDSP' , 'iDSP Pod', if ( Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'Glance' , 'Glance Pod', if ( Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'Marketing Cloud' , 'Marketing Cloud', if ( Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'Fraud Defence' , 'Fraud Defence Pod', if ( Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'Wadogo Demand' , 'Wadogo Demand', if ( (Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'NA Brand Pod' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'NA Channel Sales' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'NA Direct Sales Pod' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'NA CS TEAM' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'NA Perf Pod') , 'NA', if( (Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'EU Brand Pod' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'META Brand Pod' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'EU Perf + META Perf + ISO Pod') , 'EMEA', if( (Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'ANZ Pod' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'SEA Brand Pod' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'SEA Perf Pod' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'Korea Pod' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'India Pod' || Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'Japan Pod'), 'APAC', if(Account.Rev_Ops_Team__c == 'LATAM Pod','LATAM Pod','')))))))))))
CustomField.label: POD Name
